title: Drawing, "Oddington Church Yard, Gloucestershire, North East View", 1843
medium: Pen and black ink; brush and black and gray wash; graphite on cream wove paper
inscribed: Below image in ink: Oddington Church, Gloucestershire / North East View from the Churchyard, 1843
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: View of one side of the church and part of the graveyard. Verso: in graphite: linear sketch of the centeral church tower

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Oddington Church Yard, Gloucestershire, North East View", 1843.
1843. Pen and black ink; brush and black and gray wash; graphite on cream wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1947-106-4.
